VoiceDir5.8354D: Focused, earnest confusion. (Child grappling with meaning of death)
Line7.8354D: They were good. Kind. No different from me or dad.
Line5.8354D: Airidah said all death has meaning. But… where is the meaning in this?
Line1.8354D: A torc of protection. I make these for folk who travel the hills alone. Keep them safe with the old blessings.
MenuLabel: “A dying man spoke your name and gave me this torc before passing.”
